cause.description:
why should kids under the age of 18 not be aloud to drink?...i dont know why but we do it anyways regardless of what we were taught or told...so join this group and help me petition for kids ages of 14 and up to be able to be under the influence i say Y NOT?...so come on and help its our rights! as teens to be aloud to drink! -karen
1. we have rights to get drunk!
2. we should be able party!
3. we need to win!
cause.name: say "yes" to underaged drinking!
